metadata.title: CVE-2024-27417 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ipv6:fix potential "struct net" leak in inet6_rtm_getaddr() It seems that ifuserspace provides a correct IFA_TARGET_NETNSID value but no IFA_ADDRESSand IFA_LOCAL attributes, inet6_rtm_getaddr() returns -EINVAL with anelevated "struct net" refcount.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
